query:
INSERT INTO
                    releases (
                        artifact,
                        annotation_id,
                        project_id,
                        destination_id,
                        status
                    ) VALUES (
                        $1,
                        $2,
                        $3,
                        $4,
                        $5
                    )
                    ON CONFLICT (project_id, destination_id)
                    DO UPDATE SET
                        artifact = EXCLUDED.artifact,
                        annotation_id = EXCLUDED.annotation_id,
                        status = EXCLUDED.status,
                        updated = now()
